:py:mod:`bosk.visitor.group`
============================

.. py:module:: bosk.visitor.group

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Visitors for group modifications.



Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   bosk.visitor.group.ModifyGroupVisitor




Attributes
~~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   bosk.visitor.group.ModificationAction


.. py:data:: ModificationAction
   

   

.. py:class:: ModifyGroupVisitor(action, group)

   Bases: :py:obj:`bosk.visitor.base.BaseVisitor`

   Visitor for block groups modification, given a group and action.

   :param action: Action to perform (add block to group or remove from it).
   :param group: The group to modify.

   .. py:method:: visit(obj)


   .. py:method:: _(block)
